adverb.description: Without being aware of a situation.
examples: it will be flagged so that people don't stumble on it unawares

phrases: this morning she caught me unawares before I'd had a single cup of coffee
The police seemed to have been caught unawares by the rioting that started from Thursday night itself, when residents were fast asleep.
By the time they have cleared the school examinations, professional entrance tests are upon them, catching them unawares.
Kirstie stood speechless, taken unawares by the responsibility abruptly thrust upon her.
We've all been so worried about peak oil, it is not surprising we were caught unawares.
